channel.title: Search on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Search on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Extreme Googling
item.description: Today in Tedium: Love, hate, or criticize them, Google is just a part of life these days. (They’re marginally less evil than Facebook, which helps.) Silicon Valley’s algorithmic gift to the world is now two decades old, having celebrated its 20th birthday with a doodle just last week, one that came a few weeks after its actual birthday—the September 4, 1998 incorporation of the company. It’s strange to consider that a company so fundamental to our world is still so relatively young.
